ul {display: block; list-style-type: disc; margin: 1em 0; padding-left: 40px; list-style-position: outside;}

settings.title: DO YOU SHIP INTERNATIONALLY?
settings.content: We only ship to physical addresses within the 48 contiguous United States. We do not ship to Alaska, Hawaii, APO/FPO addresses, or US Protectorates. We do not ship outside the United States for now.

settings.title: DO I NEED TO PAY FOR SHIPPING?
settings.content: We will take the costs for you, just for you to have the best shopping experience.We also set up other shipping methods to allow customers to choose according to their needs.

settings.title: WHAT SHIPPING METHODS ARE AVAILABLE?
settings.content:
USPS | FedEx| UPS| AMAZON
We will use a variety of shipping methods just to allow customers to receive the product as quickly as possible.

settings.title: HOW LONG WILL IT TAKE TO GET MY PACKAGE?
settings.content: Usually within 2-7 business days you will receive your order.

settings.title: WAHT IS THE WARRANTY ON MY PURCHASE?
settings.content: You have 30 days to return an item to us in its original condition. Any modifications or alterations to the product will void the original warranty.We are not directly liable for any loss, theft, or damages, during delivery. Please be patient as we have to claim the damage with the shipping courier and send you the parts or replacement.

settings.title: WHO SHOULD I CONTACT IF I HAVE ANY QUESTIONS?
